title: Alex Jones Show - 2014 Mar 21 FR [sebaygo1]
description:
The Alex Jones Show 
Friday, 21 March 2014


[sebaygo1]


Show Description
................
From the Infowars web site :: On this Friday, March 21 edition of The Alex Jones Show, Alex covers the latest act of citizen journalism as an activist interrupts a BBC live broadcast to warn of "institutional pedophile rings" operating in the United Kingdom. 

Other news on Alex's radar includes the prospect of the government assassinating protesters, as it planned to do during the its battle against the Occupy Wall Street movement, the fall of the middle class, and Al Sharpton's move to circumscribe and dominate "civil rights" following Rand Paul's defense of the Bill or Rights. 

On todayÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s broadcast, Alex talks with British MP, writer and activist George Galloway, renowned for his "colorful rhetoric and combative debating style." Mr. Galloway talks about the crisis in Ukraine and the crimes of Ken Lay and Tony Blair.

 to listen to a spectrum of voices in order to better

 mainstream corporate media for news and info is a 
 prescription for ignorance. I try to share information
 that counters the monotone of mainstream corporate media.
 
 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
